author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26813 "Remove PFElectronAlgo and PFPhotonAlgo used back in Run 1" is still leading to some follow-ups:

* the PFSCEnergyCalibration class is now not used anymore, so it can be removed together with the associated configs in particleFlow_cfi.py
* the remaining calibrations were wrapped in shared_ptrs, probably because they were shared among the various algos, but I think it's easier if the ownership is clear. With PFElectron- and PFPhotonAlgo gone, there are not other algos to share the calibrations with anyway
* therefore I got rid of all usages of shared_ptr in RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles and matrix tests pass.
title: Avoid shared_ptr in RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer and remove PFSCEnergyCalibration
